item.title: Awesome Kubernetes Resources
item.description: A much more comprehensive list can be found here. This is likely a subset of the items in that repo and a few additions of tools i’ve tried out or want to try out to make my K8s life easier. CLI Tools: Helm Kubernetes package manager K9s CLI management tool. kube-shell integrated shell environment Cluster Provisioning kind Docker based kubernetes deployment. minikube VM based cross-platform kubernetes with addons support Automation and CI/CD
